text:
[Verse]
Sunshine through the window
Birds chirp outside
Lazy afternoon glow
Just wanna lie

[Verse 2]
Soft breeze comes and goes
Time feels so slow
Stay here where life flows
Nowhere to go

[Chorus]
Lazy afternoon
Nothing to do soon
Just me and my tune
Under the bright moon

[Bridge]
Forget the busy days
Keep worries at bay
In this simple haze
Let's drift away

[Verse 3]
Clouds forming pictures
In the blue sky
In this world of fixtures
No need to comply

[Chorus]
Lazy afternoon
Nothing to do soon
Just me and my tune
Under the bright moon
title: Lazy Afternoon
